translations: v．压碎，揉皱：用力压或揉使之变形或发出嘎吱嘎吱的声音。
· She was scrunching the paper in her hand.

sentences.sentence: My insides were all properly aligned now instead of scrunching together.
sentences.translation: 我的内脏都在合适的位置上而不是挤在一起。

sentences.sentence: For example, injecting botox into muscle groups near the eyes will temporarily paralyze those muscles, keeping them from scrunching up.
sentences.translation: 比如，将肉毒杆菌注射到眼部附近的肌肉群会暂时麻痹这些肌肉，使之不再收紧。
